Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • businessmodel.Action

  • public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing an action.
    Author:
    team 10

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Action(java.lang.String descr)
      This method constructs a new action with a given description.
      Action(java.lang.String descr, java.util.ArrayList<Component> comp)
      This method constructs a new action with a given description and list of components.
